name: K.E.R.B.
description:
SCENARIO:
You are an explorer in a strange planet. There are red, green and blue enemies and that planet is full of red, green and blue toxic gas. 
If you kill a red monster, level of red gas will be reduced. If the bar gets full, you die.
If you kill a green monster, level of green gas will be reduced. If the bar gets full, you die.
If you kill a blue monster, level of blue gas will be reduced. If the bar gets full, you die.
If enemies kill you, you die.

PROGRESS:
I couldn't finish it yet. There are bugs, and the game lacks the fun in that stage. That's my first jam. Have fun, if you find any in it.
